Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... Sterling... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @... Sterling... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and..., well, husband!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5367: There comes a time in everyone's life when we find ourselves taking unexpected paths. Sometimes, for reasons that may not even seem logical to us at the time#$b#And yet today, I find myself binding in marriages two people who found themselves escaping their lives, and joining us at the valley.#$b#Sterling, @, truth was$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Jade in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Sterling in the bonds of marriage.

Entries.NPC.cs.4001: Honey... I wanted to give you that fruit as a symbol of my love.$l
Entries.NPC.cs.4440: {0}, When I think about us starting a family I just get so.... Emotional. I hope our adoption papers get approved.$4
Entries.NPC.cs.4441: {0}, I filed our adoption papers. Now all we can do is cross our fingers and wait.$l

Entries.Event.cs.1635: Sorry, @. I already said I'd dance with someone else.

Entries.ExtraDialogue_NewChild_SecondChild1: Just look at our family... We've come a long way, haven't we?$6
Entries.ExtraDialogue_NewChild_SecondChild2: Three great kids... We've come a long way, haven't we?$6
Entries.ExtraDialogue_NewChild_Adoption: So, you ready to be the best parents %kid1 could ever have?$6#$b#It's a pretty tall order, but I think we'll manage.$h
Entries.ExtraDialogue_NewChild_FirstChild: So, you ready to be the best parents %kid1 could ever have?$6#$b#It's a pretty tall order, but I think we'll manage.$h
Entries.ExtraDialogue_Spouse_KitchenBlocked: You've got a bunch of your stuff blocking the kitchen... I don't know where you wanna keep all that, so could you tidy it up?
Entries.ExtraDialogue_Spouse_MonstersInHouse: Uh... peach? What are these monsters doing in here?
Entries.ExtraDialogue_Mines_PlayerKilled_Spouse_: You were gone so long I started to get worried about you! What happened down there? Can you walk?$10
You were gone so long I started to get worried about you! What happened down there? Can you walk?$10

Entries.ExtraDialogue_Town_DumpsterDiveComment_A: Don't worry dude. I'm backing down and pretending I saw nothing.$1
Oh hella! Are we looking for something in particular?$1

Entries.Characters_MovieInvite_Spouse_Sterling: Date night at the movies?$1#$b#Nothing would make me happier, sugarcakes. Why don't you go get ready while I pack us some snacks to sneak in?$10

Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Sterling: When we met, I showed you all the worst parts of me...$3#$b#And you chose to stick with me, anyway."/pause 500/speak Sterling "Then you chose to be with me and... and love me. Even though you see who I am.$3#$b#Or maybe because you see me.$6"/pause 1000/speak Sterling "You didn't quit on me, and I'm never gonna quit on you...#$b#...Even if you fart in your sleep.$6"/pause 100/emote farmer 12/pause 200/speak Sterling "I'm kidding, I'm kidding.$h"/pause 1000/emote Sterling 40/pause 1000/speak Sterling "Looking out at all this...$6#$b#I just--"/faceDirection Sterling 3/speak Sterling "I see you too, you know?$l
